Burma: First Burmese invasion of Siam begins
France: Francis I died. He was succeeded by his son Henry II.
Germany: Schmalkaldic War: The war ended in an imperial victory.
Malta: Attempted invasion of Malta at Marsaxlokk, by Ottomans and Barbary pirates under the command of Turgut Reis.
Russia: An elaborate ceremony crowned Ivan the first Tsar of Russia.
